title.bibl: Novi Svijet, Nov. 13, 1924. Vol. 2; No. 15. Dedication of National Croatian Hall in South Chicago

div.bibl: Novi Svijet, Nov. 13, 1924. Vol. 2; No. 15. DEDICATION OF NATIONAL CROATIAN HALL IN SOUTH CHICAGO

body.p: The Croatian Center of South Chicago has completed the building of a hall and will celebrate its opening Sunday November 23, 1924. The celebration will take place in the new hall on 9620 Commercial Avenue. The Committee is promising a rich program for the occasion. It is hoped that all fraternal and cultural groups will help to make the celebration a success.
